name: Sleepless Dreaming
description:
Can you really dream when you are awake? or does that mean it has to be real? I leave it to you to decide. 

This is a short horror game loosely based around a reoccurring nightmare I had over 2 years ago.  This project has been in the works for about a year and is the first thing I have ever made. I hope you enjoy it.  Also the options and credits buttons don't work. I don't plan on fixing this.

Follow me on Instagram @burntdr3ams

EPILEPSY WARNING

This game contains flashing images and lights,
